post.body: absolutely - esp as it's a kimono from Tokyo :D
by misinterpreting the rules
Ssssh! ;) - tho think wi-fi safe now coz Leon says so..
my job here is v nearly done.. g'night all
mum won. brother moody. i conquered south america but couldn't kick mum out of india to get asia
today's game: RISK
hooray! brother gave me my birthday present - the one from xmas 2007
It's all downhill from here - so says my mum
brother won even though we were playing it wrong. mum now discussing how she would have won if played right
brother's tactic is not to make any accusations so we're at total stalemate
this game is a total mind****
suspecting miss scarlett
brother doing his pretending to be stupid routine
panic over. shaker located
crisis! no dice shaker in the box.. mother in a panic
time for cluedo
brother gives mother wireless router for christmas...hello wi-fi!
happy christmas. house still quiet as a mouse zzzzz L:Forest in mid-wales
merry xmas teemu! - when are you signing up to twitter..or do you prefer to lurk? ;)
looking at old reservoir gods games via hatari. 13 years ago. yikes
